settings.html:
As a business with PECO as your utility provider, you can save up to $165 per light*, thanks to PECO Ways to Save, when you upgrade your outdoor area lights to the latest in LED lighting technology. Even if you already have LED lighting, you may still be eligible for incentives for more efficient lights. If you're a contractor or electrician, you can also access instant rebates when purchasing lighting for a qualifying customer.

With these rebates, you can enjoy even greater energy savings and reduced maintenance costs, while also improving the look of your property.

How It Works

  1. Choose the rebate-eligible LED outdoor area lights or retrofits that best suit your property. (See the list of qualifying lights below.)
  2. Contact ELEDLights to confirm your rebate eligibility and amount.
  3. Place your lighting order through ELEDLights to have your rebate applied instantly & start saving money on your energy bills.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to upgrade your lights and save on energy costs. And it's not just pole mounted lights that qualify for PECO Ways to Save incentives! Qualifying high bays and LED tube lights may be eligible for incentives that bring their costs down to as little as $1/fixture plus sales tax. Let our team know all your lighting needs & we'll find all the utility incentives you qualify for.

Ready to access your PECO Ways to Save incentives for a lighting upgrade? Call ELEDLights at 215.355.7200, text us at 267.266.8330, send an email to lights@eledights.com or learn more about our work with PECO Ways to Save & find out if your business qualifies for incentives.

*Rebate amount dependent on incentive program rules. Qualifying equipment is subject to the specifications, terms and conditions outlined in PECO's program application. Size of rebate is dependent on the light output of the fixture or retrofit.
